title: course-of-action
description: A Course of Action is an action taken either to prevent an attack or to respond to an attack that is in progress.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `course-of-action`.

action_type.description: The type of action defined by either the action_bin property or the dereferenced content from the action_reference property. Open Vocab - course-of-action-type-ov.

os_execution_envs.description: A recommendation on the operating systems that this course of action can be applied to.

action_reference.description: The value of this property MUST be a valid external reference that resolves to the action content as defined by the action_type property.

name.description: The name used to identify the Course of Action.

description.description: A description that provides more details and context about this object, potentially including its purpose and its key characteristics.
